name: Maroof Ali Syed
title: Full Stack Developer
summaryBig: Full Stack Developer pursuing MCA at Jamia Millia Islamia, experienced in building clean, responsive applications with modern frameworks, APIs, and databases. projects.title: Motioned Interactive Personal Portfolio Web App
projects.description: Built a 3D portfolio with dynamic content via SanityIO and multiple profiles. Integrated Three.js, GSAP, and Framer Motion for immersive 3D animations and smooth transitions.

projects.title: E-commerce Web App with CMS
